title: [MAC] Patcher Issue
body: Yes, I know plenty of people have had the "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." error come up when trying to play, but I'd to see a possible mac solution. I was able to play one ranked game this morning, once through, the notification to restart my client appeared during the honor screen. I've gone through the Hextech Repair Tool using the Force Repatch option, here are my [logs](https://www.dropbox.com/s/o7nf8gx5l1pufc2/LoL%20Logs.zip?dl=0). I'd like to get all the help I can. Thanks <3

replies.body: If you're still experiencing this issue, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those logs.  Our tech guys can work with you directly to see what's going on.  See you there!

Hey! Update! I got my league client to open up, HOWEVER, [it only stayed on for about a minute before the same error popped up] for mac users I went to : Finder > Located the league of legends application > right click > show package contents > contents > lol > and launched the "League Client" application. Might want to do this if just need to save / buy something, dunno but it just got my client open for a minute or two.
